Package edu.unca.csci202

Class Cell

java.lang.Object
edu.unca.csci202.Cell
public class Cell extends Object
Provides a cell that has a value and visibility indicator.
Author:
Caleb Knapp

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Cell(int row, int col)
    A new Cell starts as next to zero mines and hidden.

  • Constructor Details

    • Cell

      public Cell(int row, int col)
      A new Cell starts as next to zero mines and hidden.
      Parameters:
      row - Integer 0 to 7 of the Cell row.
      col - Integer 0 to 7 of the Cell column.

  • Method Details

    • flip

      public void flip()
      Changes a hidden spot to a visible one.

    • toString

      public String toString(boolean peak)
      Variable toString based on the boolean input.
      Parameters:
      peak - A boolean value to override a cell being hidden.
      Returns:
      The value of the cell if it is visible or if peak is true.

    • getCellValue

      public String getCellValue()
      Gets the value of the cell regardless of it being visible or not.
      Returns:
      String of length 1 being "M" or "-"

    • setCellValue

      public void setCellValue(String cellValue)
      Sets the cell value to the input character.
      Parameters:
      cellValue - Should be a single character

    • getRow

      public int getRow()
      Gets the Cell's Column.
      Returns:
      An integer between 0 and 7.

    • getCol

      public int getCol()
      Gets the Cell's Column.
      Returns:
      An integer between 0 and 7.

    • isVisible

      public boolean isVisible()
      Checks if cell is visible.
      Returns:
      Boolean of the Cell's visibility

    • setVisible

      public void setVisible(boolean visible)
      Changes visibility.
      Parameters:
      visible - Boolean to set visibility to.
